    • Constructor Detail

      • ActionController

        public ActionController(int INTERVAL,
                boolean autostart)
        Class constructor that does localization and sets up the thread loop
        Parameters:
        INTERVAL - the refresh rate of the Timer
        autostart - the flag that start the Timer on startup or not

        public boolean isTimeShort()
        Calculates the remaining time and returns if there is enough time to continue the routine

      • jobAssigned

        public boolean jobAssigned()
        Reads the BTN and CTN and returns the robots job for the heat
        Returns:
        true if the robot is a builder or false if it is a collector
